Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Kenton
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Grand, Cicero, North Ave., and Grand over normal route, due to a street blockage near Grand/Kenton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Cicero, North Ave., and Grand over normal route, due to a street blockage near Grand/Kenton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a sick customer.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
